duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and execute strategic writing in response to Medicaid request for proposals (RFP) and requests for information (RFI).
Identify and incorporate baseline material, independent research, approved guidepost/gateway collateral and original writing to address RFP or RFI questions aligned with the approved strategy.
Collaborate with subject matter experts (SMEs) to identify and obtain new information to create a compliant and responsive answer to the RFP question.
Meet all established pens down deadlines and facilitate review meetings.
Prepare drafts for discussion during review meetings and participate in gold team review discussion as requested.
Remain on-call following review to assist with response changes as requested.
Ability to adapt to rapidly changing priorities through the identification and execution of creative solutions.
